data.text: @Lenea_andersen Exactly, the pets come first. Yeah, I'm not worried about another sale not happening lol.
@mandy_harker Hehehe us pet moms. There will be another sale ;)
@Lenea_andersen My thoughts exactly. No, I didn't end up getting a pair of Dr Martens. I decided to use the money to buy puppy stuff lol.
@ratgirl71 I used an ice pack and the swelling, itching and pain settled but it's still red.
@LydiaLinsmeier The ice pack definitely helped. I'm still very red but the swelling has gone down and it's not as itchy.
@mandy_harker Mine spread to about 10cm and lasted about a week. Aloe Vera might be good to help settle it down a bit.
